basics.name: Charles ROY
basics.label: AI Engineer & Developer
basics.summary: Artificial Intelligence Engineer with a strong background in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and the development of innovative software solutions. Passionate about solving complex problems and optimizing processes through AI and cutting-edge technologies

work.name: Wessling part of ALS Global
work.summary: As an AI Engineer and Developer at Wessling (now ALS France), I was responsible for creating and energizing the Artificial Intelligence department. My main mission was to develop end-to-end solutions to meet the varied needs of our different services.
highlights: Designed, developed, and deployed complete Artificial Intelligence solutions
Worked closely with various departments to understand their needs and challenges
Constantly sought to innovate and optimize processes and solutions using the latest technologies in AI and software development
Actively contributed to the creation and energizing of the AI department by providing technical expertise and training team members
responsibilities: Developing end-to-end AI solutions to address specific needs of services, including needs analysis, technical architecture design, AI model development, and integration into existing systems.
Collaborating with various departments to ensure developed solutions meet their expectations.
Innovating and optimizing processes and solutions using the latest technologies and methodologies in AI and software development.
Providing technical expertise, training team members, and participating in the definition of strategic objectives for the AI department.
achievements: Successfully developed and deployed multiple AI solutions that improved service efficiency and quality. For example a model able to detect asbestos fibers in images.
Enhanced inter-department collaboration, leading to more effective and tailored AI solutions.

work.name: AI Engineer Formation
work.summary: Learned the foundation in developing and deploying end-to-end AI solutions. Completed the comprehensive AI Engineer path from OpenClassrooms, equipping me with advanced skills in machine learning, deep learning, and AI project management.
highlights: Designed, developed, and deployed complete Artificial Intelligence solutions
Trained and fine-tuned various machine learning and deep learning models
Managed AI projects from conception to deployment, ensuring alignment with business objectives
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into existing systems
Stayed abreast of the latest advancements in AI technologies and methodologies
responsibilities: Developing end-to-end AI solutions, including needs analysis, technical architecture design, model development, and system integration.
Training and fine-tuning machine learning and deep learning models to address specific business needs.
Managing AI projects, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with strategic objectives.
Collaborating with various departments to understand their challenges and develop tailored AI solutions.
Continuously innovating and optimizing AI processes using the latest technologies and best practices.
achievements: Successfully completed the AI Engineer path from OpenClassrooms, gaining expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and AI project management.
Developed and deployed multiple AI solutions that improved operational efficiency and decision-making processes.
Enhanced inter-departmental collaboration, leading to more effective and tailored AI solutions.
Contributed to positioning the company as a leader in the use of AI in environmental analysis and consulting.

work.name: Thales DMS
work.summary: Focused on the development and updating of simulation models, collaborating with small teams to meet client demands and utilizing CI/CD tools for continuous integration and deployment.
highlights: Developed and updated simulation models for the Rafale using C++
Collaborated with a small team to effectively respond to client demands
Utilized CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Jira for continuous integration and deployment
Discovered and corrected memory leaks, enhancing system performance
Created technical documentation to support development processes
responsibilities: Developing and updating simulation models using C++.
Collaborating with small teams to meet client demands and ensure project success.
Using CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Jira for continuous integration and deployment.
Creating technical documentation to support development and deployment processes.
Discovering and correcting memory leaks, adding new features, and improving system performance.
achievements: Modernized the Rafale flight simulator, enhancing its performance and capabilities.
Successfully discovered and corrected critical memory leaks, significantly improving system stability and performance.

work.name: Astek
work.summary: As a Consultant Developer at Astek, I provided expert development services to various high-profile clients, including Thales DMS, Continental AG, and MBDA. My role involved developing and updating simulation models, embedded systems, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful delivery of projects.
highlights: Provided expert development services to leading companies in defense, automotive, and aerospace industries
Developed and updated simulation models and embedded systems using C++
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to meet client demands and ensure project success
Utilized CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Jira for continuous integration and deployment
Worked in dynamic project environments with peer reviews and continuous improvement
responsibilities: Developing and updating simulation models and embedded systems using C++ for clients in various industries
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand client needs and deliver tailored solutions
Using CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Jira for continuous integration and deployment
Participating in peer reviews and contributing to the improvement of coding standards
Ensuring the successful delivery of projects through effective project management and collaboration
achievements: Successfully delivered multiple projects for high-profile clients, enhancing their system performance and reliability
Improved team collaboration and project delivery through effective use of CI/CD tools and peer reviews
Contributed to the optimization and modernization of simulation systems and embedded software for critical applications

work.name: Scality
work.summary: Participated in a hackathon organized by Scality to evaluate the performance of their product. Contributed to a comparative evaluation project of Scality's RING object storage technology against a competitor.
highlights: Participated in a hackathon to evaluate the performance of Scality's RING object storage technology
Co-managed and coordinated the project with another collaborator, following the Scrum methodology
Presented the project specifications and led working sessions on various aspects of object storage
Contributed to technical discussions and decisions on topics such as convergent encryption and API compatibility
Participated in demonstrations of developed features and comparative evaluation results
responsibilities: Evaluating the performance of Scality's RING object storage technology against a competitor
Co-managing and coordinating the project using the Scrum methodology
Presenting the project specifications
Contributing to technical discussions and decisions
Participating in the demonstration of developed features and results
achievements: Successfully completed a proof of concept (POC) and met the expectations of Scality
Enhanced team collaboration and project delivery through effective use of Scrum methodology
Contributed to the evaluation and improvement of Scality's object storage technology

highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Include FR - EN translations

projects.name: LaboForum 2025 Conference
projects.description: participate in the LaboForum 2025 conference 'La place de l'I.A. dans les laboratoires', talking about the place of the AI in the industry.
highlights: Networking with industry professionals
Showcasing AI solutions

projects.name: Computer Vision Project
projects.description: A computer vision project that detects objects in images using deep learning from scratch.
highlights: Built with python and pytorch
Azure cloud deployment
Real-time object detection

projects.name: AI Model Deployment

highlights: Containerized AI models for easy deployment
Tried to Improved scalability and reliability

Supports moderation commands
include command to register users in a database

projects.name: World of Warcraft - Private Server
projects.description: A private server for World of Warcraft, allowing players to experience the game to develop my skills in C++ and server management.
highlights: Build with C++ and MySQL
Use docker for deployment
